bibl.title: Consensus Standardization in the Systematic Approach to nomina sacra in Second- and Third-Century Gospel Manuscripts.
bibl.note: [Introduction.] - Second- and early third-century gospel MSS. - Systematic contraction. - Comparison with Septuagint MSS. - Conclusion.
